segments.text: Oh dear, this kitchen is in quite a state.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and the water is just cascading down the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel so bad for the poor woman, she hasn't even noticed the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids, oh those poor kids, they're going to get into trouble if they're not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that wobbly stool, reaching for cookies like nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope they don't fall and hurt themselves, that would be terrible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the water, oh the water is just everywhere, it's going to cause so much damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish there was something I could do to help, but I feel so helpless right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just making me feel so down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope things turn out okay for everyone involved.
segments.speaker: PAR
